description.value:
Replaces Lungs and Respiratory System, +20 to Toughness to resist airborne toxins and gases. Poor: -20 to Silent Move/Stealth Tests, -10 to any tests involving strenuous physical activity. Good: counts as full life support.

Effect: Rare / Initiated

Notes: 800 T 10 R
